emuInput.TitMainTitle: Vice President Richard Milhous Nixon waving to crowd, with Hugh Scott standing on right, on stage in Syria Mosque for 1958 Republican campaign
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 18, 1958, pg. 1 reads: " 'Veep' Responds - Vice President Richard M. Nixon responds to a thunderous ovation as he reached the speaker's platform at Syria Mosque last Friday afternoon. The crowd heard Mr. Nixon inform local Republican leaders that the average worker earns more per week and year under the Eisenhower Administration, than even under Franklin D. Roosevelt or Harry S. Truman. - Harris Photo."
